com.T05.krowdtrialz.model.experiment

Class StatisticsExperiment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.T05.krowdtrialz.model.experiment.Experiment
      • com.T05.krowdtrialz.model.experiment.StatisticsExperiment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Tagged
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IntegerExperiment, MeasurementExperiment

    public abstract class StatisticsExperiment
extends Experiment
    Super class for types of experiments for whiche statistics such as mean and standard deviation can be calculated.

      • getDataAsArray

        protected abstract double[] getDataAsArray()
        Helper method to get trial data as a array of doubles. This needs to be implemented by subclasses.
        Returns:
        Trial data as an array of doubles.

      • getStdDev

        public double getStdDev()
        Calculates the standard deviation of all trials in this experiment.
        Returns:
        The standard deviation.

      • getQuartile

        public double getQuartile(int q)
        Calculates the value of the qth quartile. For example, getQuartile(2) returns the 2nd quartile (median).
        Parameters:
        q - The number of the quartile.
        Returns:
        The value of the qth quartile.

      • getMean

        public double getMean()
        Calculates the mean value of all trials in this experiment.

        The mean.

        Returns:
        The median.
